topics.body:
Well I just learned something interesting.

Well you know how in the west since the rise of video games violence in the usa has gone down?  It's not just violent games either; in japan since the rise of hentai and hentai games the number of rapes has gone significantly down as well.

I have a feeling that if there was a long term study into violence of gamers vs non-gamers it would have "moral guardians" exploding in anger. . . or it just getting squashed by a gag order or something
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f3f7516368725ed45d0300#post_54f3f7516368725ed45d0300
I think the rate of rape in Japan is one of the lowest in the world. And this just strengthens my theory that pornography actually makes people more gentle and open to sexuality.
